forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle blanket of clouds enfolds the city, with temperatures settling around a comfortable 54 degrees. The air carries a brisk west-southwest wind, lightly stirring the atmosphere at speeds up to 21 mph. There's an invigorating freshness about the evening, albeit tinged with the faint whispers of marine fog, likely clinging close to the edges where the land meets the bay.

As dawn breaks tomorrow, the city will awaken to a predominantly sunny day, giving way to a high of 63 degrees. This warmth, curiously, will ebb slightly as the afternoon progresses, a playful nod from the coastal winds. With gusts reaching up to 26 mph, one can expect a lively breeze that will add a touch of excitement to the day. The forecasted sunny disposition invites one to step outside, perhaps for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a relaxed coffee at a corner café, where one can savor the vibrant energy of the city unfurling before you. A light jacket might offer a layer of comfort, perfect for enjoying an afternoon outdoors as the sun dances lightly in the cooler breezes.
